TopicTitle: stay on target trench run challenge

Articles.Content:
So you know that really steep canyon near the muns east farside crater? Ever wanted to fly through it?

INTRODUCING THE MUN CANYON CHALLENGE!!!!!

Goal: fly through the big canyon east of the muns east farside crater.

To enter: submit an imgur album multiple pictures required or a youtube vid of your trench run

Rules:

1. don't crash

2. the mission must not start or end with a suborbital trajectory, no landings

3. no mechjeb, or other mods that make it easier to fly

4. no infinite fuel/rcs while in orbit of the mun ( you can cheat to get into an orbit)

5. have fun

6. bonus points if you hit the 2 meter ventilation shaft

here is my example submission, as you can see I don't care about the video quality, I just need proof
